result.title: Nintendo Music
result.description:
Nintendo Music is here! You can listen to music from your favourite series, including Super Mario and Animal Crossing, any time.
A Nintendo Switch Online membership is required to use this app.

◆ Featuring music from:
・ Pikmin 4
・ Pokémon Scarlet and Pokémon Violet
・ Splatoon 3
・ Animal Crossing: New Horizons
・ Kirby Star Allies
・ Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
・ The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
・ Metroid Prime
・ Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade
・ Donkey Kong Country
...And more!
Please note that some music from the full soundtracks may not be included.

◆ Extended playback
You can extend the length of a supported track to keep listening to it, for example when you're working or studying!
Tracks can be extended to 5, 10, 15, 30 or 60 minutes.

◆ Listen offline
Download tracks and enjoy them even when you're not connected to the internet.

◆ Play music in the background
You can keep playing music when the screen is off or when you're using other apps.

◆ Sleep timer
Allows you to set a time limit after which playback will stop.
You can use it when you want to set how long you'd like to listen to music, such as before going to sleep.

◆ Create playlists
Organise your favourite tracks into playlists.

Attention:
● A Nintendo Switch Online membership is required to use this app.
● A Nintendo Account is required.
● Android version 9.0 or higher is required to use this app.

Nintendo Account Agreement: https://accounts.nintendo.com/term_chooser/eula

© Nintendo

result.developerLegalAddress: 11-1, KAMITOBAHOKODATECHO, MINAMI-KU, KYOTO, 京都府 601-8116, Japan
result.recentChanges: We've fixed some issues to allow for a smoother experience when using this app.
